annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 7-204, the “Frigid Temperature Protection Amendment Act of 1988”, see Mayor’s Order 89-123, June 2, 1989.

annoGroup.heading: Mayor's Orders
annoGroup.annotation: Establishment—D.C. Hypothermia Procedures, see Mayor’s Order 2001-161, October 31, 2001 ( 48 DCR 10776).
